title: New Banshee Stealer Variant Bypasses Antivirus with Appleâ€™s XProtect-Inspired Encryption
description: Cybersecurity researchers have uncovered a new, stealthier version of a macOS-focused information-stealing malware called Banshee Stealer. "Once thought dormant after its source code leak in late 2024, this new iteration introduces advanced string encryption inspired by Apple's XProtect," Check Point Research said in a new analysis shared with The Hacker News.
